attributes.action: Acknowledge the Transport Secretary Douglas Alexander works for us the tax payers and should be fired if he purposely and wilfully attempts to press ahead with road charges against the wishes of the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Transport Secretary Douglas Alexander had agreed the number of signatories for the on line poll against road pricing showed a strength of feeling among motorists.
But he said it would not deter him from commissioning large-scale road-pricing trials.
As usual a politician has forgotten who he works for and so should be immediately removed from his position
